nodes.text: Fizz-candy was a type of candy which had frothy bubbles in it. At the onset of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, Hetzal system scantech Merven Getter thought to himself that at the speed the pieces of hyperspace debris entering the system were moving, they could do enough damage that it didn't matter whether they were asteroids, starships or bubbles of fizz-candy, as anything they hit would be destroyed.
